LISP55.title: Trip Through the Robot
LISP55.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 55 - Trip Through The Robot.m4v
LISP55.description: While in the Valley of Shadows the Robot is affected by strange forces and grows to the size of a building. Will and Dr. Smith enter the Robot to try to reverse the process and save him.

OEJK1961.path: ../Westerns/One-Eyed Jacks (1961 - need subs for small bits).m4v
OEJK1961.title: One-Eyed Jacks (1961 - need subs for small bits)

AMLD1946.path: ../1940's Classics/Matter of Life and Death, A (1946).mp4
AMLD1946.title: A Matter of Life and Death

LISP54.title: The Colonists
LISP54.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 54 - The Colonists.m4v
LISP54.description: A female alien meets the Robinsons and uses them to help erect an arch to bring her people to colonize the Robinsons' planet.

4C8B6865.title: Exposed
4C8B6865.description: Colonel Paul Foster is a test pilot whose aircraft is accidentally caught up in a battle between an Unidentified Flying Object and a SHADO rocket.

43A09985.title: Leave it to Beaver - 138 The Big Fish Count

457902B1.title: Leave it to Beaver - 137 Beaver's Tonsils

LISP53.title: Revolt of the Androids
LISP53.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 53 - Revolt Of The Androids.m4v
LISP53.description: In the second of two sequels to 'The Android Machine', Verda's sheltered by the Robinsons after she's marked for destruction by the Celestial Department Store. To that end, the store dispatches a killer android: IDAK (Instant Destroyer And Killer).

253A2CEE.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 139 Beaver's Poster.m4v
253A2CEE.title: Leave it to Beaver - 139 Beaver's Poster

A00E93CE.title: Leave it to Beaver - 136 Beaver's Old Buddy

40AE66B3.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 140 Mother's Helper.m4v
40AE66B3.title: Leave it to Beaver - 140 Mother's Helper

HOLM06.title: The Speckled Band
HOLM06.description: A young woman asks for Holmes' help when her ill-tempered stepfather moves her into the same room where her sister died under mysterious circumstances.

LISP56.title: The Phantom Family
LISP56.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost In Space 56 - The Phantom Family.m4v
LISP56.description: While John and Maureen are away observing volcanic activity, the alien scientist Lemnoc captures Don, Judy, Penny, and Dr. Smith and replaces them with android duplicates. Lemnoc then forces Will and the Robot to train the duplicates in survival skills, hoping that they will be an inspiration to his own people, who are losing the will to live.

LOEZ1937.title: The Life of Emile Zola
LOEZ1937.description: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfus Affair.
